original: Lilja, Ivan Nils Allan, kyrkoherde, Hallvards, f. 18/7/06 i Visby av Elis L. o. Amanda Nilsson. G. 35 m. Käthy Malmberg. Barn: Ulf f. 36, Maud 40, Anne 45. — Stud:ex. i Visby 25, teol. fil. ex. i Upps. 31, teol. kand. 34, prakt. teol. prov samt prästex. 35. Kyrkoh. i Stenkumla sed. 40. Ordf. i Stenkumla past:kyrkostämma, Stenkumla o. Västerhejde kyrkostämmor, Stift. Västerhejde församhhem samt Stenkumla RK-krets, led. av Stenkumla skolråd. Vist. i Frankr. 26-27. Finl. med. Pro benignitate humana.
translated: Lilja, Ivan Nils Allan, pastor, Hallvards, born on July 18, 1906 in Visby to Elis L. and Amanda Nilsson. Married in 1935 to Käthy Malmberg. Children: Ulf, born in 1936, Maud, born in 1940, Anne, born in 1945. - Graduated from Visby secondary school in 1925, theological philosophy degree from Uppsala University in 1931, theological candidate in 1934, practical theological examination and ordained in 1935. Pastor in Stenkumla since 1940. Chairman of the Stenkumla parish church assembly, Stenkumla and Västerhejde church assemblies, Västerhejde congregation home, and Stenkumla RK district. Also served on the Stenkumla school board. Visited France in 1926-1927. Completed medical studies in Finland. Amicable disposition towards humanity.
